thread.title: "Next thing you know we hear 'Boom!'": TX student

title: "Next thing you know we hear 'Boom!'": TX student
text:
"Next thing you know we hear 'Boom!'": TX student 5:55pm BST - 01:17
Parents and students describe the moments when it became clear a shooting was taking place in high school in Santa Fe, Texas, where multiple people were killed. With sophomore Dakota Shrader saying her friend was shot in the leg. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)
